data.title: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
data.text:
Arbie and Wendy make love in an Indian burial ground cemetery.

Arbie tells Wendy, “We’re drunk.”

”My mom's a retard, and my dad's blind.” (0:00) (0:10)

Arbie tells fast food manager Denny, “My parents are retards.” (0: 12)

Cook Hummus tells the others, “Metaphorically speaking of course.”

Arbie tells Denny, referring to cook Carl Jr., ”I was anti-bestiality, and he was pro-.” (0:13)

A customer tells Arbie, “... and please substitute the cola with A Cluckwork Orange.” (0:15)

Wendy shows Arbie a photograph of Adolf Hitler.” (0: 18)

Wendy, Arbie, and another man sing in a graveyard. (0:26)

Posters for Tromeo & Juliet and Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls on dorm room wall. (0:27)

An older version of Arbie tells Arbie, “... Mom was a retard...” (0:36)

Jenny exclaims, “The shish-kebab psycho’s done it again.” (0:51)

Micki tells Gen. Lee Roy, “If you think free chicken will win us over, you are completely mad.”

”You are mad.” (0:55)

Fast food magnate Gen. Lee Roy tells Wendy, “And for the record, having a diaper fetish is a completely normal, healthy and harmless bedroom activity.”

“Who did that A-rab kill now, the retarded counter girl?”

Wendy: “A-rab? Retarded?” (0:59)

Gen. Lee Roy tells Wendy, “Well everybody knows that Tromaville is the bulimia capital of the world.” (1:00)

Old Arbie asks Arbie, “What... are you talkin’ about?... I’m you, you dumb prick.”

Wendy: “Micki, are you crazy?” (1:16)

Wendy grieves the death of Micki. (1:21)

Arbie tells Hummus and Father O’Houlihan, “It drives me nuts.” (1:22)

Wendy tells Arbie, “No, you moron.” (1:23)

O’Houlihan holds a DVD package picturing Mel Gibson and entitled, “The Passion of a Christian Looney.”

Arbie: “Wendy, you... drunk... when we first met the chief, he was drunk... and I accused you of being a... drunk...”

”Alcohol: Everyone knows native Americans are... drunks -- I mean, as soon as the Indians were tricked into becoming addicted to the white man’s fermented beverages...” (1:25)

Arbie tells Wendy, “I used my parents’ disabilities as an excuse to avoid college...” (1:30)

Hummus tells Arbie and Wendy, “I'll kill myself so that democracy can survive.”

She detonates her bombs. (1:34)

Wendy tells Arbie, referring to the chief, “Nah, he’s just loaded.” (1:35)
